Hi guys,
I did search the group for an answer to my question, but could not=
 find any clear opinions. The JUnit FAQ also has a preference on organizati=
on but that has not been updated since 2006. Also, if some people had adopt=
ed a particular method, have you had any regrets and wished you had adopted=
 the another method?

My question:What is a preferable method to place our =
JUnit tests.

Method A
----------
MyPackage
   src
      com
         mycom=
pany
            MyClass.java

   test
      com
         mycompany...etc
 =
           MyClassTest.java

Method B
-----------
MyPackage
   src
      co=
m
         mycompany...etc
            MyClass.java

MyPackageTest
   src
 =
     com
         mycompany...etc
            MyClassTest.java
